message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  How about $100?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like the product!
